TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TtsEngineAction extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定在呈现特定 将采用的语音合成标记语言(SSML)事件。

span.span: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction Bookmark = int32(3)

summary.span: 指示 将用作书签的内容。

span.span: Indicates that is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.

summary.span: 它对应于 SSML 规范中的 <mark> XML 标记。

span.span: It corresponds to the <mark> XML tag in the SSML specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction ParseUnknownTag = int32(7)

summary.span: 指示没有通过 SSML 输入确定的操作。

span.span: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.

summary.span: 此输出可以由合成引擎自行解释或忽略。

span.span: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.

summary.span: 关联的 是未知的 XML 标记，不属于 SSML 标准。

span.span: The associated is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction Pronounce = int32(2)

summary.span: 请求输入 文本将被解释为音素。

span.span: Requests that input text be interpreted as phonemes.

summary.span: 准确的发音由 实例上的 属性返回的 对象的 成员指定。

span.span: Exact pronunciation is specified by the member of the object returned by the property on instances.

summary.span: 对应于 SSML 规范中的 <phoneme> XML 标记。

span.span: It corresponds to the <Phoneme> XML tag in the SSML specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction Silence = int32(1)

summary.span: 指示 不包含要作为语音呈现的文本。

span.span: Indicates that a contains no text to be rendered as speech.

summary.span: 安静持续时间由 属性在 实例上返回的 对象的 属性指定。

span.span: Duration of the silence is specified by the property of the the object returned by the property on instances.

summary.span: 对应于 SSML 规范中的 <Silence> XML 标记。

span.span: It corresponds to the <Silence> XML tag in the SSML specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction Speak = int32(0)

summary.span: 请求应处理和通知的关联的 。

span.span: Requests that the associated should be processed and spoken.

summary.span: 这是 的默认值。

span.span: This is the default value for a .

summary.span: 它对应于 SSML 规范中的 <speak> XML 标记。

span.span: It corresponds to the <speak> XML tag in the SSML specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction SpellOut = int32(4)

summary.span: 指示由 通过其 属性提供的文本值将聚合为单独的字符。

span.span: Indicates that text values provided by a through its property are to be synthesize as individual characters.

summary.span: 此呈现包括除空格之外的标点符号以及字母数字文本。

span.span: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.

summary.span: 例如，关联的文本片段“word!”

span.span: For example, the associated text fragment "word!"

summary.span: 应合成“w o r d 感叹号”。

span.span: should be synthesized into "w o r d exclamation point".

span.span: Indicates start of sentence.
